pages.text: In this section I will try to show some tips and tricks that may prove helpful.$(br2)$(l)Fool Proof Cobble Generator $() If you do not want to turn your precious-gollum lava into obsidian, then this fool proof cobble generator is for you!$(li)Dig a 1 x 3 x 1 hole $(li)Place a non-flamable stair as shown.

pages.title: Fool Proof Cobble Gen
pages.text: $(li)Waterlog the stair $(li)Place lava as shown $(li)Mine cobble!

pages.title: Easy Tool Repair
pages.text: Repair most of your broken armor/tools/weapons in a crafting grid with the material used to craft them.

pages.title: Create Mod
pages.text: A wonderful feature in Create is Ponder. Put your cursor over the Large Cogwheel image, then press and hold the W key to view an animation using the cogwheel. Ponder is available for many Create blocks and items.

pages.title: Lookup Mods
pages.text: If you want to learn about a particular mod, then open the Mods menu page.$(li)From the main menu page, click on the  Mods icon. From within a world, open Game Menu page ($(o)default Esc key$()).$(li)Click on Mods.$(li)Search for the mod you are interested in.$(li)Click on the mod icon to show the details. You can find issue trackers, website links, and mod settings.
